analysis: The project currently has a basic HTML structure with minimal CSS and JavaScript. The event.json specifies a theme related to black holes with animated objects and slides. The existing CSS and JavaScript files are incomplete and need enhancements to create a cosmic, dark theme with animations for black hole visuals, swirling effects, and glowing elements. The HTML file needs to be completed to include all necessary sections and interactive elements.

improvements.description: Complete the HTML content to include sections for black hole information, interactive elements, and animated slides. Add a mobile-friendly navigation menu with a hamburger icon.
Enhance the CSS file to include a dark, cosmic theme with animations for black hole visuals, swirling effects, and glowing elements. Ensure the theme is visually appealing and interactive.
Fix syntax errors in the showSlide function and complete the JavaScript content to ensure all functions are properly implemented. Add event listeners and functionality for interactive elements.
